org.apache.ignite.mxbean

Interface MemoryMetricsMXBean

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MemoryMetrics

    @MXBeanDescription(value="MBean that provides access to MemoryMetrics of a local Apache Ignite node.")
public interface MemoryMetricsMXBean
extends MemoryMetrics
    This interface defines a JMX view on MemoryMetrics.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disableMetrics()
      Disables memory metrics collection on an Apache Ignite node.
      void enableMetrics()
      Enables memory metrics collection on an Apache Ignite node.
      float getAllocationRate()
      Gets pages allocation rate of a memory region.
      long getDirtyPages()
      Gets the number of dirty pages (pages which contents is different from the current persistent storage state).
      float getEvictionRate()
      Gets eviction rate of a given memory region.
      int getInitialSize()
      Gets initial memory region size defined by its MemoryPolicyConfiguration.
      float getLargeEntriesPagesPercentage()
      Gets percentage of pages that are fully occupied by large entries that go beyond page size.
      int getMaxSize()
      Maximum memory region size defined by its MemoryPolicyConfiguration.
      String getName()
      A name of a memory region the metrics are collected for.
      float getPagesFillFactor()
      Gets the percentage of space that is still free and can be filled in.
      float getPagesReplaceRate()
      Gets rate (pages per second) at which pages get replaced with other pages from persistent storage.
      long getPhysicalMemoryPages()
      Gets total number of pages currently loaded to the RAM.
      String getSwapFilePath()
      A path to the memory-mapped files the memory region defined by MemoryPolicyConfiguration will be mapped to.
      long getTotalAllocatedPages()
      Gets a total number of allocated pages related to the memory policy.
      void rateTimeInterval(long rateTimeInterval)
      Sets time interval for getAllocationRate() and getEvictionRate() monitoring purposes.
      void subIntervals(int subInts)
      Sets a number of sub-intervals the whole rateTimeInterval(long) will be split into to calculate getAllocationRate() and getEvictionRate() rates (5 by default).

        Initial size in MB.

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Path to the memory-mapped files.")
String getSwapFilePath()
        A path to the memory-mapped files the memory region defined by MemoryPolicyConfiguration will be mapped to.
        Returns:
        Path to the memory-mapped files.

      • getTotalAllocatedPages

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Total number of allocated pages.")
long getTotalAllocatedPages()
        Gets a total number of allocated pages related to the memory policy. When persistence is disabled, this metric shows the total number of pages in memory. When persistence is enabled, this metric shows the total number of pages in memory and on disk.
        Specified by:
        getTotalAllocatedPages in interface MemoryMetrics
        Returns:
        Total number of allocated pages.

      • getAllocationRate

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Allocation rate (pages per second) averaged across rateTimeInternal.")
float getAllocationRate()
        Gets pages allocation rate of a memory region.
        Specified by:
        getAllocationRate in interface MemoryMetrics
        Returns:
        Number of allocated pages per second.

      • getEvictionRate

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Eviction rate (pages per second).")
float getEvictionRate()
        Gets eviction rate of a given memory region.
        Specified by:
        getEvictionRate in interface MemoryMetrics
        Returns:
        Number of evicted pages per second.

      • getLargeEntriesPagesPercentage

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Percentage of pages that are fully occupied by large entries that go beyond page size.")
float getLargeEntriesPagesPercentage()
        Gets percentage of pages that are fully occupied by large entries that go beyond page size. The large entities are split into fragments in a way so that each fragment can fit into a single page.
        Specified by:
        getLargeEntriesPagesPercentage in interface MemoryMetrics
        Returns:
        Percentage of pages fully occupied by large entities.

      • getPagesFillFactor

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Percentage of space that is still free and can be filled in.")
float getPagesFillFactor()
        Gets the percentage of space that is still free and can be filled in.
        Specified by:
        getPagesFillFactor in interface MemoryMetrics
        Returns:
        The percentage of space that is still free and can be filled in.

      • getDirtyPages

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Number of pages in memory not yet synchronized with persistent storage.")
long getDirtyPages()
        Gets the number of dirty pages (pages which contents is different from the current persistent storage state). This metric is enabled only for Ignite nodes with enabled persistence.
        Specified by:
        getDirtyPages in interface MemoryMetrics
        Returns:
        Current number of dirty pages.

      • getPagesReplaceRate

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Rate at which pages in memory are replaced with pages from persistent storage (pages per second).")
float getPagesReplaceRate()
        Gets rate (pages per second) at which pages get replaced with other pages from persistent storage. The rate effectively represents the rate at which pages get 'evicted' in favor of newly needed pages. This metric is enabled only for Ignite nodes with enabled persistence.
        Specified by:
        getPagesReplaceRate in interface MemoryMetrics
        Returns:
        Pages per second replace rate.

      • getPhysicalMemoryPages

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Number of pages residing in physical RAM.")
long getPhysicalMemoryPages()
        Gets total number of pages currently loaded to the RAM. When persistence is disabled, this metric is equal to MemoryMetrics.getTotalAllocatedPages().
        Specified by:
        getPhysicalMemoryPages in interface MemoryMetrics
        Returns:
        Total number of pages loaded to RAM.

      • enableMetrics

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Enables memory metrics collection on an Apache Ignite node.")
void enableMetrics()
        Enables memory metrics collection on an Apache Ignite node.

      • disableMetrics

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Disables memory metrics collection on an Apache Ignite node.")
void disableMetrics()
        Disables memory metrics collection on an Apache Ignite node.

      • rateTimeInterval

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Sets time interval for pages allocation and eviction monitoring purposes.")
@MXBeanParametersNames(value="rateTimeInterval")
@MXBeanParametersDescriptions(value="Time interval (in milliseconds) to set.")
void rateTimeInterval(long rateTimeInterval)
        Sets time interval for getAllocationRate() and getEvictionRate() monitoring purposes.

        For instance, after setting the interval to 60 seconds, subsequent calls to getAllocationRate() will return average allocation rate (pages per second) for the last minute.

        Parameters:
        rateTimeInterval - Time interval (in milliseconds) used for allocation and eviction rates calculations.

      • subIntervals

        @MXBeanDescription(value="Sets a number of sub-intervals to calculate allocation and eviction rates metrics.")
@MXBeanParametersNames(value="subInts")
@MXBeanParametersDescriptions(value="Number of subintervals to set.")
void subIntervals(int subInts)
        Sets a number of sub-intervals the whole rateTimeInterval(long) will be split into to calculate getAllocationRate() and getEvictionRate() rates (5 by default).

        Setting it to a bigger value will result in more precise calculation and smaller drops of getAllocationRate() metric when next sub-interval has to be recycled but introduces bigger calculation overhead.

        Parameters:
        subInts - A number of sub-intervals.
